title: Hour 1 - Jimmy Garoppolo to Browns, Patriots Coaching Experiment
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Jimmy Garoppolo to Browns, Patriots Coaching Experiment
description:
Dan thinks the Cleveland Browns should acquire Jimmy Garoppolo from the 49ers since it looks like Deshaun Watson's suspension will be extended. And he wishes Bill Belichick luck with his unconventional coaching strategy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
